name: Izumi Sagiri | Eromanga-sensei
description:
LoRA is generated entirely from anime images.
Should work well with any model. NSFW works nicely too.

Check samples for prompts :)
For anime clothes just be specific in describing them and it should generate well.

Leave a like, comment, review but first of all, ENJOY ;)

modelVersions.name: v2.0
modelVersions.description:
• lowered file size

  • fixed clothes tags

  • removed bad images from dataset
